name: master-ball
flavor_text: The best BALL that catches a POKéMON without fail.

name: ultra-ball
flavor_text: A better BALL with a higher catch rate than a GREAT BALL.

name: great-ball
flavor_text: A good BALL with a higher catch rate than a POKé BALL.

name: poke-ball
flavor_text: A tool used for catching wild POKéMON.

name: net-ball
flavor_text: A BALL that works well on WATER- and BUG-type POKéMON.

name: dive-ball
flavor_text: A BALL that works better on POKéMON on the ocean floor.

name: timer-ball
flavor_text: More effective as more turns are taken in battle.

name: luxury-ball
flavor_text: A cozy BALL that makes POKéMON more friendly.

name: premier-ball
flavor_text: A rare BALL made in commemoration of some event.

name: dusk-ball
flavor_text: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.

name: cherish-ball
flavor_text: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.

name: potion
flavor_text: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 20 points.

name: antidote
flavor_text: Heals a poisoned POKéMON.

name: awakening
flavor_text: Awakens a sleeping POKéMON.

name: paralyze-heal
flavor_text: Heals a paralyzed POKéMON.

name: full-restore
flavor_text: Fully restores the HP and status of a POKéMON.

name: max-potion
flavor_text: Fully restores the HP of a POKéMON.

name: super-potion
flavor_text: Restores the HP of a POKéMON by 50 points.

name: full-heal
flavor_text: Heals all the status problems of one POKéMON.

name: revive
flavor_text: Revives a fainted POKéMON with half its HP.

name: max-revive
flavor_text: Revives a fainted POKéMON with all its HP.

name: soda-pop
flavor_text: A fizzy soda drink that restores HP by 60 points.

name: lemonade
flavor_text: A very sweet drink that restores HP by 80 points.

name: moomoo-milk
flavor_text: A nutritious milk that restores HP by 100 points.

name: elixir
flavor_text: Restores the PP of all moves by 10.

name: max-elixir
flavor_text: Fully restores the PP of a POKéMON’s moves.

name: berry-juice
flavor_text: A 100% pure juice that restores HP by 20 points.

name: sacred-ash
flavor_text: Fully revives and restores all fainted POKéMON.

name: hp-up
flavor_text: Raises the HP of one POKéMON.

name: protein
flavor_text: Raises the stat ATTACK of one POKéMON.

name: iron
flavor_text: Raises the stat DEFENSE of one POKéMON.

name: carbos
flavor_text: Raises the stat SPEED of one POKéMON.

name: calcium
flavor_text: Raises the stat SP. ATK of one POKéMON.

name: rare-candy
flavor_text: Raises the level of a POKéMON by one.

name: pp-max
flavor_text: Raises the PP of a move to its maximum points.

name: bright-powder
flavor_text: A hold item that casts a glare to reduce accuracy.

name: macho-brace
flavor_text: A hold item that promotes growth, but reduces SPEED.

name: exp-share
flavor_text: A hold item that gets EXP. points from battles.

name: quick-claw
flavor_text: A hold item that occasionally allows the first strike.

name: soothe-bell
flavor_text: A hold item that calms spirits and fosters friendship.

name: mental-herb
flavor_text: A hold item that snaps POKéMON out of infatuation.

name: choice-band
flavor_text: Raises a move’s power, but permits only that move.

name: silver-powder
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of BUG-type moves.

name: amulet-coin
flavor_text: Doubles money in battle if the holder takes part.

name: cleanse-tag
flavor_text: A hold item that helps repel wild POKéMON.

name: everstone
flavor_text: A wondrous stone & a hold item that prevents evolution.

name: focus-band
flavor_text: A hold item that occasionally prevents fainting.

name: lucky-egg
flavor_text: A hold item that boosts EXP. points earned in battle.

name: scope-lens
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the critical- hit rate.

name: metal-coat
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of STEEL-type moves.

name: leftovers
flavor_text: A hold item that gradually restores HP in battle.

name: light-ball
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the SP. ATK of PIKACHU.

name: soft-sand
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of GROUND-type moves.

name: black-belt
flavor_text: A hold item that boosts FIGHTING- type moves.

name: mystic-water
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of WATER-type moves.

name: sharp-beak
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of FLYING-type moves.

name: poison-barb
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of POISON-type moves.

name: never-melt-ice
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of ICE-type moves.

name: spell-tag
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of GHOST-type moves.

name: charcoal
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of FIRE-type moves.

name: dragon-fang
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of DRAGON-type moves.

name: silk-scarf
flavor_text: A hold item that raises the power of NORMAL-type moves.

name: shell-bell
flavor_text: A hold item that restores HP upon striking the foe.

name: thick-club
flavor_text: A bone of some sort. It can be sold cheaply.

name: wide-lens
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

name: life-orb
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

name: power-herb
flavor_text: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the immediate use of a move that charges on the first turn.

name: toxic-orb
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that badly poisons the holder in battle.

name: flame-orb
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a burn on the holder in battle.

name: focus-sash
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

name: destiny-knot
flavor_text: A long, thin, bright red string to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the foe does too.

name: choice-scarf
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This scarf boosts Speed, but allows the use of only one kind of move.

name: choice-specs
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk, but allow only one kind of move to be used.

name: luck-incense
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles a battle’s prize money if the holding Pokémon joins in.

name: razor-claw
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a sharply hooked claw that ups the holder’s critical-hit ratio.

name: razor-fang
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It may cause the foe to flinch when the holder inflicts damage.

name: moon-ball
flavor_text: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that evolve using the Moon Stone.

name: heavy-ball
flavor_text: A Poké Ball for catching very heavy Pokémon.

name: eviolite
flavor_text: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def of a Pokémon that can still evolve.

name: air-balloon
flavor_text: When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon will float into the air. When the holder is attacked, this item will burst.

name: red-card
flavor_text: A card with a mysterious power. When the holder is struck by a foe, the attacker is removed from battle.

name: eject-button
flavor_text: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.

name: dark-gem
flavor_text: A gem with an essence of darkness. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dark-type move only once.

name: dream-ball
flavor_text: A special Poké Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.

name: assault-vest
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

name: venusaurite
flavor_text: One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones. Have Venusaur hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: metagrossite
flavor_text: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Metagross hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: beast-ball
flavor_text: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.
